name: iOS 15 Status Bar
description:
We all use it, why not have a good one! Please suggest new features in the comments! Thank you.


UPDATE 1.5 - UPDATED FOR iOS 15


UPDATE 1.1 - ADDED CAMERA & MIC INSIDE NOTCH


UPDATE 1.0 - NOW WITH VARIANTS


Customizable time, mode, network, wifi, battery and notch.


iPadOS version coming soon.
